div.bibl: The Greek Press, Sept. 11, 1930. ST. ANDREWS GREEK SCHOOL5658 Winthrop Ave. Tel. Edgewater 0669

body.p: We are proud to make known to the parents of St. Andrew's parish on the North Side that our schools are once again opening this year.
Lessons will start Monday, Sept. 15, from 4 to 6 P.M. Religious lessons will be taught on Saturdays from 11 to 12 A.M. Tuition fees are the same.Archreverend Eirinaios Tsourounakis.
